cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 60 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

privates.name: Basic Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: Rates are for 1 people. Maximum Occupancy is 1. Bedding Configuration is 1 Single Bed. Include Free Internet and Wi-Fi.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 2 nights stay on your dates

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 22:59 30th Aug 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 22:59 30th Aug 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
